verses.verse: And an angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> to Bochim <S%H1066><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, I made you to go up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and have brought <S%H935><s%> you unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>; and I said <S%H559><s%>, I will never <S%H5769><s%> break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant with you <S%H1285><s%>.

And you shall make <S%H3772><s%> no covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this land <S%H776><s%>; you shall throw down <S%H5422><s%> their altars <S%H4196><s%>: but you have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>: why have you done this <S%H6213><s%>?

Why I also said <S%H559><s%>, I will not drive them out <S%H1644><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H6654><s%>; but they shall be as thorns in your sides, and their gods <S%H430><s%> shall be a snare unto you <S%H4170><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H4397><s%>, when the angel of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> unto all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%>.
And they called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Bochim <S%H1066><s%>: and they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> there unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

And when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> unto his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, and all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> that outlived <S%H3117><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%>, who had seen <S%H7200><s%> all the great <S%H1419><s%> works <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, that he did <S%H6213><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, died <S%H4191><s%>, being a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>.

And they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the border <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnath <S%H8556><s%>â€“heres, in the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, on the north side <S%H6828><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> Gaash <S%H1608><s%>.

And also all that generation <S%H1755><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>: and there arose <S%H6965><s%> another <S%H312><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>, which knew not the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, nor yet the works <S%H4639><s%> which he had done <S%H6213><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> Baalim <S%H1168><s%>:

And they forsook <S%H5800><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, which brought them out <S%H3318><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and followed <S%H3212><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, of the gods <S%H430><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> them <S%H7812><s%>, and bowed themselves unto them <S%H3068><s%>, and provoked the Lord to anger <S%H3707><s%>.
And they forsook <S%H5800><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and served <S%H5647><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%> and Ashtaroth <S%H6252><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and he delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of spoilers <S%H8154><s%> that spoiled <S%H8155><s%> them <S%H4376><s%>, and he sold them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, so that they could <S%H3201><s%> not any longer <S%H5750><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies <S%H341><s%>.

Wherever they went out <S%H3318><s%>, the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was against them for evil <S%H7451><s%>, as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H1696><s%>, and as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto them <S%H3966><s%>: and they were greatly distressed <S%H3334><s%>.
Nevertheless the Lord <S%H3068><s%> raised up <S%H6965><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%>, which delivered <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of those that spoiled them <S%H8154><s%>.

And yet they would not listen <S%H8085><s%> unto their judges <S%H8199><s%>, but they went a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> themselves unto them <S%H5493><s%>: they turned quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> which their fathers <S%H1><s%> walked in <S%H1980><s%>, obeying <S%H8085><s%> the commandments <S%H4687><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; but they did not so <S%H6213><s%>.

And when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> them up judges <S%H8199><s%>, then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with the judge <S%H8199><s%>, and delivered <S%H3467><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H341><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the judge <S%H8199><s%>: for it repented <S%H5162><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of their groanings <S%H5009><s%> by reason of them that oppressed <S%H3905><s%> them and troubled them <S%H1766><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8199><s%>, when the judge was dead <S%H4194><s%>, that they returned <S%H7725><s%>, and corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves more than their fathers <S%H1><s%>, in following <S%H3212><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them <S%H7812><s%>, and to bow down unto them <S%H5307><s%>; they ceased not from their own doings <S%H4611><s%>, nor from their stubborn <S%H7186><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was hot <S%H2734><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%>, Because that this people <S%H1471><s%> has transgressed <S%H5674><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I commanded <S%H6680><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>, and have not listened <S%H8085><s%> unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>;

I also will not henceforth <S%H3254><s%> drive out <S%H3423><s%> any <S%H376><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them of the nations <S%H1471><s%> which Joshua <S%H3091><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> when he died <S%H4191><s%>:

That through them I may prove <S%H5254><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whether they will keep <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to walk <S%H3212><s%> in it <S%H1><s%>, as their fathers did keep it <S%H8104><s%>, or not.

Therefore the Lord <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H3240><s%> those nations <S%H1471><s%>, without <S%H1115><s%> driving them out <S%H3423><s%> hastily <S%H4118><s%>; neither delivered <S%H5414><s%> he them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%>.
